CustomField.formula: IF( AND( OR(ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__Type__c, 'Quote'), AND( ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__Type__c, 'Amendment'), NOT(LPCR_Clone__c), NOT(SBQQ__Existing__c))), NOT(ISBLANK( LPCR_DateDebut__c )), LPCR_DateDebut__c < SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__StartDate__c ) , true, false)
